thread.title: Artezio Celebrates 15th Anniversary

author: PR.com
title: Artezio Celebrates 15th Anniversary
text:
Artezio Celebrates 15th Anniversary
On the 26th of August Artezio celebrated its 15th birthday.
Moscow, Russia, September 04, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Back in 2000, Artezio was founded in Moscow, Russia as a small software development start-up. Just in four years, Artezio already employed over a hundred technical professionals who worked on custom software development projects for clients in North America, Western Europe, Japan, and Russia. With its technology capabilities and expertise, Artezio became in 2005 a major offshore software development division of the largest IT holdings in Eastern Europe.
At present, Artezio implements projects on custom software development, integration, quality assurance, consulting for dozens of corporate customers and sets up dedicated software development centers for clients in the US, EU and other countries worldwide. Being a high quality solution and service provider, Artezio is regularly mentioned in the most significant world industrial rankings such as Global Outsourcing 100, Global Services 100, Software 500 and others. Today the company has more than 400 employees in 8 development centers in Belarus, Russia, Ukraine, Latvia. Over the past year, Artezio opened 4 Sales and Operations offices in the US (Boston, NYC, New Jersey, and San Francisco). Since its establishment, Artezio has successfully completed more than 1000 projects for clients (incl. Fortune 500 companies) from various industry segments including Finance, Telecommunications, Healthcare, Hi-tech, Public Sector, Logistics, Retail, and etc.
Pavel Adylin, Artezio CEO: "Over the last year, Artezio made considerable efforts for the further development of its North American operations. We set up representative offices in the US and built good relationships with new clients from the USA, European Union and Southeast Asia. Thanks to our employeesâ€™ high professional level, Artezio successfully competes with Asian outsourcing companies in the field of hi-tech projects."
Artezio continues its R&D activity related to the in-house software products development and implementation of cutting edge technologies. Artezio business apps based on MS SharePoint and plugins for Atlassian JIRA and MS Outlook are in high demand in online stores today. Besides, Artezio keeps on developing expertise in cloud computing, search engines, mobile technologies, BI, and Big Data.
In the near future, they are planning to set up a virtual research center for studying applied use of the Big Data concept together with one of the largest technical universities in Eastern Europe. Next year, the main objective for Artezio will remain increasing growth rates due to business diversification and sales development in North America and Western Europe.
About Artezio
Established in 2000, Artezio (www.artezio.com) is an ISO 9001:2008 certified custom software development company. Over the last 15 years, Artezio has completed more than 1000 projects. Artezio's custom software development services enable its clients to deploy multi-platform applications, resulting in leveraged power of modern software technologies. Some industry-leading sectors where Artezio holds a stellar track record include telecommunications, mobile platforms, financial services, healthcare, hi-tech, logistics, utilities as well as retail. Artezio provides IT services to small, medium, and large companies within the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, Israel, Japan, Austria, Germany, Switzerland, and Russia.
